question: My grandmother has been having back pain, high blood pressure, some heart pain, and shortness of breath.  She can barely do daily task without having to sit down for a break.  She saw her doctor and he told she had suffered from previous heart attacks without knowing (she had scar tissue).  He also told her that she most likely had a very serious heart problem but didn't know what it is.  She also has diabetes, if that makes a difference.  The doctor told her though that it was not congestive heart failure.  What could it be?
title: Heart problems
